title: Consent Policy
description: This is the base class for a consent policy definition which includes fields like name, description, and status. This class can be used to build Consent Policy XDM schemas.

xdm:cpID.title: Consent Policy ID
xdm:cpID.description: A unique identifier for the consent policy record.

xdm:status.title: Consent Policy status
xdm:status.description: Current status of consent policy from external system normalized to enabled or disabled.
